analysis.description:
AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#568-603) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#568-603):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#572-573)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#575-576)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#585-588)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#588-589)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#568-603) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#594)
	-token.transfer(referral,referralBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#598-599)

AnythingAppTokenPreSale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#568-603):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#572-573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investorCount (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#572-573)

Reentrancy in AnythingAppTokenPreSale.doPurchase (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#568-603):
	External calls:
	- token.balanceOf(msg.sender) == 0 (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#572-573)
	- referral = investorWhiteList.getReferralOf(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#575-576)
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(msg.sender).add(tokens) <= LIMIT_PER_USER) (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#585-588)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collected (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#589-590)
	- deposited (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#590-594)

AnythingAppToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#411-436)
	- /unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#417-421

AnythingAppToken.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/19/0x857597889ef49ee21699727e3749812b19e1f0e2.sol#381-399)
